stopSimulationMessage: Are you sure you want to Stop and Save this simulation?
stopCommandInitiatedMessage: Stop & Save request has been initiated for simulation: {0}
idleWarningMessage: Your monitor view will expire in...
idleWarningQuestion: Do you want to continue monitoring?
disconnectInfoMessage: As a result of a monitor view expiring, you have been redirected to the job list.
monitorExpiredMessage:
You're seeing this message because a monitor view is ending.
You can reload the monitor view or close this Job Manager window at any time.
monitorExpiredSaveAndStopMessage:
You're seeing this message because a simulation has stopped and is currently being saved.
Please be patient. It will take a while to save this simulation.
You can close this Job Manager window at any time.
